channel.title: ExionX - 317 PI - Vps hosted
channel.description:
* Image contained advertisement link Welcome to ExionX Development thread We've got to show you pictures of ExionX Which is Required by Moparscape; [center]Home [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2w2j6ab.gif[/img] Corporeal Beast [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2u7xeom.gif[/img] Dagganoth Kings [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/idwua8.gif[/img] Godwars [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/10wqkd5.gif[/img] Jad [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2dwhksm.gif[/img] Tormented Demons [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/102wccl.gif[/img] Warrior Guild [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/161ntvt.gif[/img] .GIFS - Equipment Tab [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/29oppi1.gif[/img] Curse Prayers [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/314fmhf.gif[/img] Skillcapes [IMG]http://exionx.net/Skillcapes.gif[/img] DragonFire Shield [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/20gcr2e.gif[/img] Dragon Claws [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/nxq0ib.gif[/img] Recipe for Disaster Minigame [IMG]http://exionx.net/RFD.gif[/img] Statius's Warhammer [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/72due0.gif[/img] Vesta's Longsword [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/160a9e0.gif[/img][/center] [img]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/7470/berserker.gif[/img] fully working berserker [img]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/7874/fightpits.gif[/img] fully working fight pits [img]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/7850/pkpointshop.gif[/img] fully working pkpoint shop Features: VOTE4Cash System. Webclient. Unique Community. Features + updates to come Better Pvp Auto Donater system overload pots chaotic crossbow castle wars farming working 100% more updates to come in a later date.
[b]Application[/b] job wanted?: Experience?(show proof): Do you have MSN\ other instant messenger?
currently have 0/1 Client Developer's 1/2 Server Programmer's

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=475231.msg3479561#msg3479561 date=1295991889]

I didn’t say I was smart did I?

And I didn’t say for you to LEARN Java in school I said and…, retard.

Errrrr your grammar mistake is “and…,” well done.
[/quote]Said the one who stated this:[quote author=586 link=topic=475231.msg3478472#msg3478472 date=1295900452]
I didn’t learn JAVA from school, are you stupid?, You aren’t smart what did you learn in school shit all?.
[/quote]Why the fuck are you putting punctuation after punctuation?

P.S Your grammar is shit, bro.

Coolstorybro.[/quote]Orlly?

[ul][]DFS spec is just lol
[]Defence animation should be played when attacker plays attack animation
[]In Recipe for Disaster mini you are too close to the NPC. You should be squares away * npc size (which is 2)
[]NPCs have no hit delay[/ul]

Here’s some advice for your DFS spec:

  • Animation + graphic for cast
  • 2 tickables later projectile sent
  • After graphic plays, 1 tickable later hit should show

item.title: ExionX - 317 PI - Vps hosted
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Not really. You can claim you’re programming, or you can claim you’re coding. There’s no distinct rule or difference between saying the two.

Though, programming is more of an aspect of making programs, whilst coding would be making codes that do nothing by themselves.[/quote]

Stop being stubborn and just leave him be; he can use whatever terminology he wants. Programming and coding are effectively the same thing.

As a matter of fact, in a lot of professional game company development videos they tend to use the word ‘coding’ more than ‘programming’.

Read full topic

item.title: ExionX - 317 PI - Vps hosted
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=586 link=topic=475231.msg3476183#msg3476183 date=1295723372]

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=475231.msg3476145#msg3476145 date=1295721610]

I already knew Pi was based of Emolous i wasn’t born yesterday.
[/quote]Project insanity may be based from Emulous, but it’s a decent way away.

Emulous is a lot better than Project Insanity, and I agree with everyone above this post. All you’re doing is posting DSPK pictures with small edits.

The berserker prayer was already added, the ‘pk shop’ was the Recipe for Disaster shop, you just added like 5 items and changed the name.

Anyway, @OP; your logo contains a url, which to my knowledge, hasn’t been allowed.

Your wrong it wasn’t and Curse prayers wasn’t added.

Also the pk shop isn’t the Recipe for disaster shop, your actually wrong i made it myself…

Like i said to every person above if you don’t like then don’t post, Besides that if you are intrested pm me.
[/quote]The curse prayers were added in DSPK. Well, the gfx were. Though, you didn’t provide any proof of the affects actually working.

As for the RFD, is it just a coincidence you added the same gloves, in the exact same spot, to a pk-shop?

I don’t really see how those are pk-related.

Also, we’re allowed to post whether we apply or not. You have no control over that. Plus, I don’t apply for any server unless the creator knows what they are doing. Which means, I won’t apply for this, because you guys know nothing.[/quote][quote=“X Entinity X, post:14, topic:379387”]I said “Near to perfection” not perfection dipshit. You havn’t got a dick, your a 10 year old with a little weenie so I doubt it would fit into my mums pussyo. And I have features, don’t worry about that, unlike this peace of leeched shit that you took pictures of and posted it into the wrong section, and I have a life, I havn’t been online for 4 hours and how would you know? check every hour or something or maybe it’s you who’s the no-lifer. Take this peace of shit down, that has memory leaks every where and learn JAVA.

How do I suck at PI when you don’t even know the term of “coding/code” is, you just think a good Server is a Server with shitty customs, Chaotics and PvP armours, that shit is all useless, now please do everyone a favour and leave.

www.java.sun.com - Nubcakes.[/quote]

Read full topic

For a start, don’t leech shit, if your going to leech atleast leech decent stuff, secondly, you try and get every single skill combat and none-combat near to perfection, thirdly I don’t care what my pictures look like, they’re good enough to get the point accross, fourthly i’d like to see you re-write networking, fithly don’t criticize people’s work just because they said you need improving and lastly, grow up and get a life buddy, your facts need correcting.

Oh yeh, how can pictures be boring? what do you want in a picture, your mum getting dclawed or something?
And your pictures are better yes? no I don’t think so.

That’s the thing we aren’t going to post new pictures, Come online to check.

I’v seen a server with about the same pictures for about 6 months now, It doesn’t mean that it hasn’t been updated the owners haven’t got time to keep changing the pictures regulary.

Don’t post if you aren’t going to join, I’ll consider the fact your trying to get your post count up.[/quote]

Hes not trying to get his post count up. Hes just tired of seeing the same server over and over again being used with close to nothing changed. I’m sure alot of people would agree. Also nobody is going to want to play if the pictures dont look good. Someone could have the most amazing server in the world but if the pictures look like shit, nobody is going to play it. Anyways, GL. -_-
